name: rhyme-helper
description: Generate words that rhyme with an input word

devDependencies.babel-loader: Since npm3, all peer deps need to be stated; this is for loaders
devDependencies.babel-preset-es2015: Use all the presets for ES6
devDependencies.babel-preset-es2015-loose: Not sure if I need this one - compiles to loose mode
devDependencies.babel-preset-stage-0: Enable all features basically, lowest babel stage
devDependencies.chai: Our assertion library for node testing
devDependencies.extract-text-webpack-plugin: Move all CSS into a style.css file instead of inlining

author: Robert Wettlaufer
